DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare efficacy nicardipine labetalol attenuation cardiovascular response endotracheal intubation .
DOC.criteria: Patients schedule general anesthesia endotracheal intubation Patients heart failure coronary artery disease 23 degree atrioventricular block severe bradycardia ( < 45 beats/min ) asthma , bronchial spasm chronic obstructive pulmonary disease patient anticipate difficult intubation ( Mallampati class III , IV ) severe hepatic renal dysfunction allergy contraindication study medication
